definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: the whole, all (BH [[כּׂל]]);—emph. [[כּׂלָּא]] Da 2:40 +, cstr. [[כּׂל]] Da 2:12, Da 3:2 +, [[כָּל־]] Da 2:8 +, sf. 3 mpl. [[כָּלְּהוֹן]] (so Palm. Lzb:296 Cooke:No. 117, Tariff ii b. 18) † Da 2:38, Da 7:19 (Qr f. [[כָּכְּהֵּן]]);—
[[כּׂל חַכִּימֵי בָבֶכ]] the whole of ( = all)  the wise men of B. Da 3:2, Da 3:3, Da 3:5, etc.; Da 6:2 [[כל־מלכותא]] the whole of the kingdom, v:Da 6:4; c. sf. the whole of them, Da 2:38, Da 7:19.
with a sg. noun, understood collectively, every, any, or with a neg. none (BH

definitions.title: 1 b
definitions.body: ):Da 3:29 [[דִּי כָל־עַם]] [[אֻמָּה וְלִשָּׁן]] that every people, nation, and language, etc., Da 6:8 [[מִן־כָּל־אֱלָה]] of any god, Ezr 6:12 [[כָּל־מֶלֶח וְעַם]]; [[כל אנשׁ די]] every man who = whoever, Da 3:10, Da 5:7, Da 6:13, Ezr 6:11; Da 2:10 [[לא]] …[[בל מלך ]]: [[שׁאל]] no king hath asked . . . , v:Da 2:35, Da 4:6, Da 6:5, Da 6:24; so [[כָּל־דִּי]] (= Heb. [[כָּל־אְִשֶׁר]]) whoever Da 6:8, Ezr 7:26, whatever v:Ezr 7:23, [[בְּכָל־דִּי]] wherever Da 2:38(cf. [[אְִשֶׁר]]

definitions.title: 2 b
definitions.body: ):Da 2:40 [[חָשֵׁל כּׂלָּא]] crushing all things, Da 4:9, Da 4:18 [[וּמָזוֹן לְכׂלָּא־בֵהּ]] and food for all was in it, v:Da 4:25 [[כּׂלָּא מְטָא]] all came upon N. (cf. [[חַכּׂל בָּא]] Jos 21:43), Ezr 5:7 [[שְׁלָמָא כׂלָּא]] all peace (K:§ 83 d; cf. in Heb. [[כֻּלּוּ]] etc., after their noun : BH
